title: Random client freezing during champ select
body: I got several unwanted "dodges" when this happens... Am i going to be punished when this accumulates to certain amount of dodges?

replies.body: Freezing at champion select is usually due to using third party programs that aren't interacting properly with league.  This happens especially so after a patch, and I would recommend any apps you are using like play.tv, lolrecorder, overlays, etc.  Continuing to [dodge ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging)will incur escalated wait times, or LP loss if it's for ranked.  Let me know if that helps!
